interpretation: The snail emoji is a symbol of slow progress and patience. It reminds us that sometimes the journey is more important than the destination. This card encourages us to take our time and enjoy the process, rather than rushing towards our goals. The snail is also a reminder to slow down and take a break when we need it. It's important to recharge our batteries and take care of ourselves. The snail can represent a period of rest and reflection, allowing us to gather our strength for the next phase of our journey. Keywords associated with this card include patience, slow progress, rest, reflection, and self-care. Overall, the snail encourages us to embrace a slower pace of life and trust in the journey.
